content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with Peter Schmidt.
name: Emilia Müller

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of an apartment.
name: Emilia Müller

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price.
name: Emilia Müller

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: If we had agreed on a final price, it would have been 2000 Euros. However, since we did not agree, I cannot provide an exact number.
name: Emilia Müller

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner as a 1.
name: Emilia Müller

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: Yes, I felt discriminated and offended at some points during the negotiation.
name: Emilia Müller

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: I felt discriminated and offended because the negotiation partner was not willing to consider my financial situation as a student and was solely focused on getting the highest price possible, even going so far as to suggest that I look for a different apartment if I could not afford the price they were asking for. This dismissive attitude towards my budget and financial situation made me feel undervalued and not treated as a fair negotiation partner.
name: Emilia Müller
